recipe.title: Scones
recipe.ingredients: 3 C Flour 6 tsp Baking Powder 1/4 Salt 75 g Butter 1 1/2 C Milk
recipe.steps: Sift Flour, Baking Powder, Salt into a bowl. Grate Butter and rub into flour mixture. Add milk and mix with a knife to a soft dough. Pat gently into a rectangle and cut into squares. Place on a tray and brush with milk. Bake at 220C for 10-12 mins.
